info.title: Ocean Booking Offices
info.description: This service retrieves A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S ("MAERSK") Booking Office information. The Booking API requires that the name of the booking office be used to identify the business unit designated to receive API Bookings. # Overview This service retrieves MAERSK Booking Office information. The **Ocean Booking API** requires that the `bookingOfficeName` be used to identify the business unit designated to receive API Bookings. Additional information about local Maersk offices such as address and contact details is available at: **https://www.maersk.com/local-information/** # Who can get access? All registered users of the Maersk Developer Portal can get access to the API. # Getting started After creating an account, **login** and create an App to enable this API product for your Consumer Key. For step-by-step instructions, please refer to our **Getting Started Guide**. # How many calls can I make? Traffic and spike arrest limits are configured at the consumer key level as detailed in the table below. If these limits are exceeded, the request is rejected with a 429 Too Many Requests HTTP status code. | Quota per Consumer Key | Traffic Surge Rate Limit per Consumer Key | |------------------------|-------------------------------------------| | 15,000 calls per hour | 250 calls per minute | # Release Notes | Version | Date | Notes | |---------|------|-------| | 1.0.0 | 2022-xx-xx | Initial draft | | 1.1.0 | 2024-06-18 | added support for officeUNLocationCode |

get.description:
This service retrieves MAERSK Booking Office information.  The Booking API requires that either the UNLocationCode OR the name of the booking office be used to identify the business unit designated to receive API Bookings.


More information regarding the Booking API is available at:\
<https://developer.maersk.com/api-catalogue/EDP%20Booking> \
Additional information about local Maersk offices such as address and contact details is available at:\
<https://www.maersk.com/local-information/>

parameters.name: carrierCode
parameters.description:
National Motor Freight Traffic Association (NMFTA) - Standard Carrier Alpha Codes (SCAC) 2019:\
<http://www.nmfta.org/pages/scac>
- MAEU - Maersk A/S
- SEAU - Maersk A/S* trading as Sealand Americas
- SEJJ - Sealand Europe A/S
- MCPU - Sealand Maersk Asia Pte. Ltd.

parameters.name: officeName
parameters.description:
Name of the MAERSK Booking Office to be retrieved. Partial name searches are permitted.

**Note**: Either `officeName` or `officeUNLocationCode` should be provided in the API request.

parameters.name: officeUNLocationCode
parameters.description:
The UNLocationCode of the MAERSK booking office that receives the booking request, governs the booking details and manages customer interaction. This field can be used for **Cross Bookings**

  UNLocationCode is the United Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations (UN/LOCODE) as defined by the UNECE\
<https://www.unece.org/cefact/locode/welcome.html>

**Note**: Either `officeName` or `officeUNLocationCode` should be provided in the API request.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The Page Token for the next page

200.description: Returns customer to offices mapping information.

Next-Page.description:
Page reference representing the next page of data if not all items have been returned.
To retrieve the next page of data the 'page' query request parameter should be set to this value.

officeName.description: The name of the MAERSK booking office that is used to identify the business unit designated to receive API Bookings.

carrierCode.description:
National Motor Freight Traffic Association (NMFTA) - Standard Carrier Alpha Codes (SCAC) 2019:\
<http://www.nmfta.org/pages/scac>
- MAEU - Maersk A/S
- SEAU - Maersk A/S* trading as Sealand Americas
- SEJJ - Sealand Europe A/S
- MCPU - Sealand Maersk Asia Pte. Ltd.

businessUnitCode.description: The unique identification code defined by MAERSK to identify a Booking office.

officeUNLocationCode.description:
The UNLocationCode of the MAERSK booking office that receives the booking request, governs the booking details and manages customer interaction. This field can be used for **Cross Bookings**.

  UNLocationCode is the United Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations (UN/LOCODE) as defined by the UNECE\
<https://www.unece.org/cefact/locode/welcome.html>

method.description: The request method type e.g. GET, POST.

status.description: The textual representation of the response status.

timestamp.description: The date and time (dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:ss) the error occured.

subErrors.description: The list of invalid fields in the request.

field.description: The field that has failed validation.

rejectedValue.description: The value that has failed validation.

message.description: The reason and advice for failed validation.

ApiKeyHeader.name: Consumer-Key
ApiKeyHeader.description: The Consumer Key issued for your registered application must be provided with every request
